attributes.action: To award Captain Eric Brown RN Retd. a knighthood for services to aviation and his country.
attributes.additional_details:
I hereby petition Her Majesty's Goverment to propose  Captain Eric Melrose Brown CBE, DSC, AFC, KCVSA, PhD Hon FRAeS, RN Rtd.be knighted for services to aviation and to his country.
This man deserves far more.....
It is amazing that people have received awards for far less than he has achieved in his service to this nation.
